title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message: Got this very dirty machine that gives no POST and off corse remain in black screen, I cleaned it up also with IPA can't see any corrosion or damaged components but still run only in SMC mode then I'm guessing its is an issue with the SMC but how do you troubleshoot SMC issues?

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message: Apply some flux on SMC and heat to about 150ºC....

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message: Some measurements first. What is PPBUS_G3H, I suspect corrosion around isl6259.

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message: il check it tomorrow and will update..thanks.

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message:
[QUOTE="aprendiz, post: 4318"]Apply some flux on SMC and heat to about 150ºC....[/QUOTE]
Isent it to low for reflow? If 150 is the correct temp for how long should i reflow it?

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message: The heating did the trick though no boot on ssd so i turned it off and reset smc and its back to no POST once again..

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message:
Boardview and schematic for this one?
edit: got it already, thanks!

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message: Maybe to much crap under SMC, you need to reball the chip......

title: [SOLVED] Macbook Pro 15" Retina A1398 POST only in SMC mode
message: Got it done after heat on SMC and GPU (probably crap)  works fine the last two hours...thanks a lot guys!
